summary:
Nelleke has spent 40 years as a designer of unique conferences and publications, culinary writer, and consultant on topics ranging from the creative interpretation of Annual Reports to developing inspiring meetings, working with some of the largest organizations in The Netherlands and well-known designers, writers, and chefs. Strengths include creative thinking, program development and logistics, and budget planning.
Her experience is very broad because in every field creativity is needed – therefore she has flexibility to work with a wide range of companies and industries: banks, insurance, retail, production, accountancy, food and publishers. 

Specialties: 
* Creation of conferences & seminars
* Developer of local and international inspirational trips
* Author of three healthy eating cookbooks and editor of more than 20 cookbooks of various cuisines
* Consultant for culinary events (Member IACP), specializing in the American kitchen.
* Book writing coach

treasury_media.title: Mindpower TV: Nelleke van Lindonk
treasury_media.description: Nelleke van Lindonk, co-fouder en directeur PINC.nl Conferences. Naast haar bezigheden voor PINC bedenkt Nelleke culinaire concepten, schrijft kookboeken en geeft structuur aan projecten. ⟶ Klik hier om meer van Mindpower TV te zien ⟵

profile_positions.description: My two passions: the culinary field and support for finding speakers for events. I combined those two passions in my own business: https://vanlindonk.nl/
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
2014: LEKKER, Havermout, Quinoa en meer… A follow-up of the book LEKKER LANG JONG, scheduled for publishing on April 1st.

2013: LEKKER LANG JONG, based on the bestseller 'De Voedselzandloper' by Kris Verburgh. The book has 175 recipes about how to stay young in a healthy way by eating less bread, pasta and potatoes. 5th print run in 11 months 
http://lekkerlangjong.nl

2010: HET KEUKENBOEKJE, about being sustainable, buying and cooking food and eating healthy. 2 print runs in one year
http://www.hetkeukenboekje.nl/ 

2003: DE VERENIGDE STATEN VAN AMERIKA, published by Nijgh & van Ditmar, is a travel cookbook. 

Additionally, edited more than 25 cookbooks for Albert Heijn, Blue Band, Het Vleesbureau, Het Zuivelbureau, and de Bijenkorf, among others.
She also developed and tested original recipes, styled food for 3 Chinese Chef cookbooks, among others, and was a co-writer for the Swiss publication The Culinary Chronicle. 

Besides that she has taught cooking classes about American, Italian and Chinese Food.
profile_positions.title: Cookbook author

profile_positions.description:
2003: DE VERENIGDE STATEN VAN AMERIKA, published by Nijgh & van Ditmar, is a travel cookbook. A personal story about 14 culinary travel trips by car or motor home through 36 states in the USA, highlighting local restaurants, festivals and food producers.
https://www.facebook.com/DeVerenigdeSmakenVanAmerika

https://www.facebook.com/DeVerenigdeSmakenVanAmerika

Monthly column (about 100) at: http://www.verenigdestaten.info/category/column/culinair/
profile_positions.title: De Verenigde Smaken van Amerika

profile_positions.description:
* Architect of the PINC Conferences. PINC stands for People, Ideas, Nature, Creativity; the main conference is held annually in the Netherlands since 1999. PINC is an inspiring cascade of new ideas, great stories, and unexpected visual presentations delivered by a superb selection of national and international speakers from every imaginable discipline. Develop and oversee all aspects of the event from program creation, speaker scouting, media outreach and public relations, graphic design, logistics and menu. Annual attendance of 500 innovators, creative thinkers, entrepreneurs, communication specialists, designers, artists, scientists and economists.
PINC features 16 international speakers, who have little in common except that they have a passion for what they do and absolute faith in the power of innovation, inspiration and creativity. A selection of speakers over the years include Bertrand Piccard, (Record-Breaking Balloonist); Tina Urm (cleaning Estonia) ; Tim Smit (Creator and CEO Eden Project, Cornwall); John Wood (Author of Leaving Microsoft to Change the World); Fernando and Humberto Campana (Industrial Designers); Matt Flannery (Co-Founder Kiva); Julie Taymor (Creator of ‘The Lion King’); Donna Brazil (CNN Political commentator); Ken Brecher (Executive Director and Co-founder Sundance Film Festival); David Gallo (Director Woods Hole Oceanographic Institute; Sugata Mitra (Hole in the Wall/TED man of the year in 2013); Michael Moschen (Cirque du Soleil); Story Musgrave (NASA Astronaut); Richard Noble (World Land Speed Record Holder); Jeff Pisciotta (Head Nike Research Lab); Marc Abrahams (Founder of the IG-Nobel Prize at Harvard) and many more.

* Creater of PINC-like tailor-made conferences and seminars for leading businesses. 

Clients including KLM; Strukton; AAW; De Hypotheker; Arcadis; Koninklijke Nederlandse Boekverkopersbond; Equens; Martinair; Ministerie van Justitie; ACMC, Koninklijk NIVRA (NBA); Erasmus Universiteit; Eneco; & KiKa.
profile_positions.title: Director and co-founder

profile_positions.description:
Coaching and editing author Eveline Jurry on her book about 'how to divorce in a positive way.'
http://evelinejurryconsultancy.nl/pages/boek.htm
profile_positions.title: Book Writing Coach for  'Je wordt Weer Gelukkig'

profile_positions.description: PINC.Food was a conference highlighting a diversity of culinary topics including the slow food movement, vertical farming, trends, and cookbook publishing, among others.  Developed and oversaw all aspects of the event from program creation to logistics and menu to hosting.  Attended by 350 culinary experts from thoughout the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Director and creator

profile_positions.description: Van Lindonk Special Projects was a leading publisher of corporate books in the Netherlands. All of these publications have one thing in common: they begin with a creative concept. Among the 700 publications created throughout my 35-year tenure are included annual reports for Deloitte, World Wildlife Fund, and Staatsbeheer; Jubilee books for Ahold, Shell, Cosun, Goudse Verzekeringen, Klene, Ministerie of Justitie, Centraal Boekhuis, VSB, Delta Lloyd and Rabobank; and special publications for Mölnyke, Albert Heijn, MSD, De Bijenkorf and Unilever
profile_positions.title: Owner and Director
